Portal2は、いいぞ。
Portal無印から大幅ボリュームアップされた多種多様のギミック！明かされる謎！オンラインプレイ！DLC！GLaDOS様！！！感動の結末！！！！！！！！！！
ステージの難易度は絶妙で、パズルゲーム好きにはたまらない垂涎ギミックが満載です。特にロゴを大ジャンプするステージは魂が震えました。
オンライン協力プレイも適度にGLaDOS様が罵ってくれるので気分が高揚します。

やりこみ要素も楽しいですし、自分で一通りプレイした後に他の人のアクロバティックな荒業動画を見るのも最高です。
me encantaria un a 3ra parte estuvo muy bueno y su final fue increible
Ставлю 5 классов, топ за свои деньги

Um dos meus primeiros jogos na Steam.
O primeiro que eu completei todas as conquistas e despertou meu vicio por sempre tentar 100% em qualquer jogo que seja.
Единственный раз когда хочешь впихнуть деньги в габена(͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
A classic puzzle game worthy of all its praise

Patrzyłem sobie na Steam'e jakieś ciekawe gry i natknąłem się na grę w którą  kiedyś za dzieciaka grałem. Była to seria Portal.
Jednak zdecydowałem że jak grałem w jedynkę to jeszcze raz wrócę do dwójki i tak się stało.
]PORTAL 2 
Kontynuacja gry z 2007 roku w której jako Chell-Obiekt testowy przechodziliśmy komory testowe  za pomocą urządzenia portalowegodla GLaDOS-Sztucznej inteligencji która pod koniec fabuły chciała nas zabić a my się mścimy na niej przy okazji zabijając ją. Na pierwszy rzut oka gra wygląda ładniej
i lepiej od poprzednika  pod względem graficznym bo pamiętam jak w jedynce podczas ucieczki cykałem się uciekając jak najszybciej bo myślałem że gdzieś w dali jakiś zombie patrzy. D: Fabularnie też super podczas naszej ponownej przygody w Aperture poznajemy zabawnego i gadającego rdzenia: Wheatley'a który chce pomóc nam uciec z ośrodka. Jednak nie udaje się nam uciec bo GLaDOS zmartwychwstaje i zabiera nas na ponowne testy, bez wheatleya. Audio niszczy! Po ukończeniu fabuły w napisach końcowych GLaDOS śpiewa piosenkę która wpada ostro do ucha. 
Rozgrywka to przyjemność. Wieżyczki,lasery.kostki,GLaDOS w ziemniaku...
OCENY: 
Grafika: 8/10- Source jeszcze daję radę i myślę że Gabe jak się nauczy liczyć do trzech to jeszcze przy trzeciej części wyglądało by to pięknie.
Audio:10/10
Grywalność: 9/10
Ocena:9,5/10- Za krótka trochę ale bardzo dobra!
Po prostu kup i graj!!!
This game is amazing / i love the tests  finished in 10 hours

I don't really write steam reviews too often. If I feel a serious need to write said review due to a games very high quality, I will. Or maybe It will be a joke review for a bad game, or just made for some steam event. This review that you are currently reading is neither of those two last things, but the former. I've held back on writing this due to just how much I feel the need to express how I absolutely adore this game, and how I need this to be well executed. So here it is.

The first Portal game was great. Superb mechanics, great puzzle, interesting boss fight. It was nice, but to me felt a bit like a tech demo. The mechanics and setting had so much potential that could be expanded upon. That is exactly what Portal 2 is. The puzzles feel more challenging, the game looks a bit nicer, and most of all there is SO much more story. Portal 1 was simply wake up, go along with puzzles, fight GlaDOS, roll credits. It was a great game but nothing special story wise. Portal 2 changes that entirely.

This might seem a bit ridiculous, but I feel a serious need to dedicate this paragraph to the games dialogue. If you've played the game you might understand what I'm talking about. Without giving too much away, GLaDOS is much more sinister in this game, Wheatley is a very much welcome addition with plenty of highly entertaining lines, and lastly Cave Johnson. J. K. Simmons is the one to voice Cave, and it is one of my personal absolute favorite rolls he has ever done. There are so, so many lines of his that are so memorable, snappy, and hilarious. I won't put any here, however, because they are best experienced through the game first.

Alright, the gameplay. The mechanic of portals is a really simple one. They can only go on white tile, and you place two and they connect together. Simple enough. But this game does so much with these mechanics. Momentum is a huge aspect of many puzzles, and orange and blue gel, which make you go faster and jump higher respectively, are a great addition to the base mechanics.

Personally I regard Portal 2 to be one of the very best games ever made. The puzzles are seriously satisfying, and the story is phenomenal. Now, one last thing about that story. AVOID SPOILERS AT ALL COSTS. When I first played through the game I was young and naive, and I chose to look up the ending online. One of the biggest mistakes I've ever made. This game is best experienced blind. Do not look up puzzles unless you are seriously stuck. I regard the ending to this game as one of the, if not the very best in all of gaming. Please don't ruin it for yourself.

So yeah, buy the game, it's pretty cheap and is practically always on sale. Play the first one before this, though, which is also very cheap and very often on sale. And Valve, if you're listening, (I know you're not but I still have to do this) make a Portal 3, I would sell my soul for it.

5/5 Very strongly recommend.

Jogo incrível, sem exageros. Humor excelente, com ótimo elenco de dublagem. Jogabilidade muito divertida e fácil, e o acréscimo do coop permite ainda mais horas de diversão. Recomendado demais, um dos poucos jogos que conseguiu ser melhor que o primeiro.
